title: Unclear code in prepare_train_labels
body:
I am trying to understand the code.. and I have some queries.

This line https://github.com/Daniil-Osokin/lightweight-human-pose-estimation.pytorch/blob/3fced2c8fb771a82e26246691de6a3cd9b4e05b9/scripts/prepare_train_labels.py#L101 specifies that if there's a crowd, annotation for this image won't be added to `annotations_per_image_mapping`.

The line here https://github.com/Daniil-Osokin/lightweight-human-pose-estimation.pytorch/blob/3fced2c8fb771a82e26246691de6a3cd9b4e05b9/scripts/prepare_train_labels.py#L108 indicates that the image will only be added to `crowd_segmentations_per_image_mapping` if it has a crowd in it.

Hence, I don't think this condition https://github.com/Daniil-Osokin/lightweight-human-pose-estimation.pytorch/blob/3fced2c8fb771a82e26246691de6a3cd9b4e05b9/scripts/prepare_train_labels.py#L114 will ever be true.

Now, even if it gets true, we don't need to do this https://github.com/Daniil-Osokin/lightweight-human-pose-estimation.pytorch/blob/3fced2c8fb771a82e26246691de6a3cd9b4e05b9/scripts/prepare_train_labels.py#L115. As the dictionary already contains the whole annotation including the segmentation part which was added here https://github.com/Daniil-Osokin/lightweight-human-pose-estimation.pytorch/blob/3fced2c8fb771a82e26246691de6a3cd9b4e05b9/scripts/prepare_train_labels.py#L104.

So, I think that we can directly access the segmentation part by using `annotation['image_id']][0]['segmentation']`.

I am currently looking at COCO 2017 person keypoints json file. Thank you..
